programme.desc: Rancangan khas yang akan membawa anda ke tempat menarik dari sungai hinggalah ke tempat tersembunyi untuk memancing. Kali ni, kita ke lubuk memancing di Lumut, Perak. Bersama Joe Aziz.

programme.title: Ronda Roda S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Ronda Roda kali ini, menampilkan kereta Honda WRV, Mira Rizam dan Hazmi. Yang dihoskan oleh Azizul Ammar dengan mempamerkan kereta baru dari Hondadan hasil tangan dari Mira dan Hazmi.

programme.title: Deko Bajet S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Untuk episod ini, pereka bentuk dalaman, Janna Baha selaku pengacara juga akan menghias ruang tamu milik Afrizal dan Afifah di sebuah taman perumahan di Bukit Beruntung, Rawang.

programme.title: Resepi Moyang S8 Ep04
programme.desc: Resepi Moyang merupakan sebuah rancangan memasak yang mengetengahkan masakan tradisional dari serata Malaysia dan juga luar negara. Dalam episod ini, hos akan belajar memasak masakan Vietnam iaitu Sambal Tahun @ Taun Kulit, Perut & Paru Lembu dan Ungkep Ayam. Dihoskan oleh Emilia Han.

programme.title: Bakar S14 Ep03
programme.desc: Untuk episode kali ini, Adreena akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan peach cobbler dan apple crumble cheesecake.

programme.title: Terbaik Dari Jalanan S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Ikuti Suffren dan Banni dalam jelajah mereka menikmati makanan-makanan terbaik dari gerai, warung dan kedai kaki lima. Untuk episod kali ini, akan pergi ke Warong Soto Shamsalwah, Nasi Kahwin Hari-Hari, Cakoi Mr Johan dan Aroma Selera Johor.

programme.title: Ekspresi Fesyen S3 Ep05
programme.desc: Ekspresi Fesyen minggu ini host Aqilah Azali akan berbual fesyen bersama penyanyi Lia Aziz.. Akan berkenalan dengan pereka fesyen disebalik label pakaian MisClair juga kita akan disajikan dengan segala macam info yang menarik tentang Fesyen.

programme.title: Rojak S8 Ep03
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Leaism, beliau akan melakukan aktiviti yang tidak pernah beliau cuba, mencuba makanan baharu, dan berkongsi pengetahuan am. Selain itu, terdapat juga segmen melibatkan respondan luar iaitu Cabaran dan juga Soalan Rawak.

programme.title: Celebs Day Off S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Saksikan bagaimana seorang selebriti mengisi hari cuti mereka dengan bermacam aktiviti-aktiviti menarik. Dihoskan oleh Asmawi, anda akan mengenali lebih lanjut kisah kehidupan dan karier tetamu undangan kali ini, Qi Razali.

programme.title: Resepi Moyang S8 Ep03
programme.desc: Resepi Moyang merupakan sebuah rancangan memasak yang mengetengahkan masakan tradisional dari serata Malaysia dan juga luar negara. Dalam episod ini, hos akan belajar memasak masakan Vietnam iaitu Nasi Lemak Pandan & Sambal Udang dan Buko Mangga. Dihoskan oleh Emilia Han.

programme.title: Lubuk S3 Ep08
programme.desc: Rancangan khas yang akan membawa anda ke tempat menarik dari sungai hinggalah ke tempat tersembunyi untuk memancing. Kali ni, kita ke lubuk memancing di Lumut, Perak. Bersama Joe Aziz.

programme.title: Ronda Roda S3 Ep07
programme.desc: Ronda Roda kali ini, menampilkan kereta Honda WRV, Mira Rizam dan Hazmi. Yang dihoskan oleh Azizul Ammar dengan mempamerkan kereta baru dari Hondadan hasil tangan dari Mira dan Hazmi.

programme.title: Girls Only S9 Ep03
programme.desc: Girls Only musim terbaru menampilkan 2 pengacara baru iaitu Leiasm dan Aqilah Azali. Episod kali ini kita bersama Dr Sara yang akan membincangkan tentang beauty with brain; sumpahan atau anugerah?

programme.title: Huru Hara S14 Ep08
programme.desc: Di hoskan oleh Anas Ridzuan, Huru Hara kali ini pasti membuatkan anda terhibur sambil bergelak ketawa. Dalam episod ini kita santai santai bersama barisan artis yang terdiri daripada Adami Hairi, Ezzaty Abdullah, Azwan Kombos dan Mark Adam.

programme.title: Sembang Selebriti S9 Ep04
programme.desc: Sembang Selebriti kali ini menampilkan Taufiq Hanafi sebagai selebriti jemputan dimana beliau akan berkongsi cerita cerita yang menarik mengenai diri beliau dan juga pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni tanah air.

programme.title: Kapsul
programme.desc: Kapsul masa wawasan 2020 yang ditanam oleh Tun Dr. Mahathir Mohamad telah dicuri dan membawa Zohri ( Faizal Hussein ) kembali ke masa lalu. Zohri kini terperangkap di tengah-tengah pergolakan bangsa Melayu untuk mencapai kemerdekaan dan membawa bangsa Melayu keluar dari belenggu kemiskinan. Zohri melihat dan merasai sendiri erti perjuangan umatnya yang tidak pernah dibayangkannya selama ini. Dia lihat, dia rasa dan kini dia mula faham betapa peritnya liku-liku sejarah negara dan bangsa. Perjalanan Zohri berterusan dari satu zaman ke satu zaman dan tiada siapa yang dapat mengembalikannya ke zamannya melainkan dirinya sendiri.

programme.title: UC 2
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri yang bahagia mula mengalami mimpi ngeri di rumah mereka apabila perbuatan ghaib dan misteri mula berlaku.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Gemersik Berbisik E8 - Akhirnya dengan keupayaan yang mereka ada, mereka berhubung dengan hantu buaian(yang sering menyanyikan lagu buaibuaiku laju pada malam hari).

programme.title: Taxi 5
programme.desc: Seorang pegawai polis yang ditukarkan dalam polis Marseilles ditugaskan untuk menumpaskan sekumpulan perompak Itali yang memandu Ferrari berkuasa bersama anak saudara Daniel yang lebih tua, seorang pemandu yang teruk yang mendapat teksi putih legenda.

programme.title: Hantu Tenggek
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penipu yang diketuai oleh Tariq yang berpura-pura mengusir tempat berhantu telah diperas ugut oleh Tuan Sidek, seorang pemaju bangunan. Mereka perlu meyakinkan pesaing Tuan Sidek bahawa bangunan tertentu berhantu apabila mereka terperangkap di dalamnya. Kecuali mereka tidak perlu meyakinkan kerana bangunan itu benar-benar dihantui oleh roh yang tidak tenteram. Roh memerlukan bantuan mereka untuk memenuhi hasrat terakhirnya

programme.title: Azem 4
programme.desc: Ilmu hitam yang canggih telah ditetas oleh seorang syeikh yang jahat dan seorang ibu yang kembali menziarahi anaknya dan isterinya. Tujuan ilmu hitam itu tidak ketara tetapi ia berakhir dengan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh isteri terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: Rumah Angker Pondok Indah
programme.desc: Sebuah rumah, di mana telah berlaku pembunuhan keluarga, yang terdiri daripada seorang suami, isteri dan anak lelaki mereka. Sejak itu, rumah tersebut dikenali sebagai Rumah Berhantu Pondok Indah, kerana setiap penghuni baru yang menghuni rumah tersebut sentiasa digeruni oleh roh/hantu yang menghuni rumah tersebut. Beberapa tahun kemudian, sebuah keluarga baru menduduki rumah itu, jadi perkara yang sama berlaku lagi. Mereka digeruni oleh hantu rumah. Bolehkah mereka menyelamatkan diri daripada ketakutan hantu rumah atau dibunuh seorang demi seorang?

programme.title: Khurafat
programme.desc: Kisah bermula dengan Johan, seorang pemuda yang bekerja sebagai Pembantu Hospital. Sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai seorang isteri bernama Aishah. Pasangan ini diawal perkahwinan hidup aman dan bahagia namun tanpa disangka trauma melanda dipertangahan jalan. Mereka sering diganggu oleh lembaga aneh

programme.title: Arjuna Ep20
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Reva Guna Guna
programme.desc: Reva, seorang pelajar yang ceria, tiba-tiba berubah selepas ulang tahunnya yang ke-21. Reva menjadi murung dan mengasingkan diri dari masyarakat. Kemudian di rumahnya, ibunya dan dua adik lelakinya dibunuh dengan tragis. Reva akhirnya diisytiharkan sebagai pembunuh dan dipulihkan di hospital mental. Devi, kawan baik Reva, tidak percaya ini dan merasakan ada sesuatu tentang Reva dan dari makhluk ghaib ini, ia didedahkan siapa yang membunuh ibu dan adik-beradik Reva

programme.title: Cicakman 3
programme.desc: Berlatarkan selepas 7 tahun acara Cicakman 2: Planet Hitam.Cicakman, bekas adiwira Metrofulus telah menghilangkan diri dengan orang mendakwa Cicakman sudah mati atau sudah bersara.Dalam ketiadaannya, adiwira baharu yang dikenali sebagai SuperBro telah muncul dan menjadi bekas pertahanan Metrofulus.

programme.title: Kampung Drift
programme.desc: Mengisahkan pengembaraan hidup seorang remaja bernama Johan dalam mencari erti kejayaan dan kehidupan menerusi sukan drift yang berkait rapat dengan sejarah hidupnya. Walaupun ditentang keras oleh ayahnya untuk menyertai sukan drift, minat Johan terhadap sukan itu tidak pernah pudar. Bersama-sama kawan baiknya, Bojeng, pakciknya, Ajoi, dan saintis gila, Pak Idon, dia akan menggunakan apa sahaja cara untuk melibatkan diri secara aktif dalam sukan pemotoran drift itu. Minat Johan mula bertukar menjadi sebuah impian besar apabila dia mendapat tahu sejarah hitam ayahnya yang berkait rapat dengan sukan drift. Namun, penglibatan Johan dalam sukan drift ini menghadapi jalan sukar apabila dia terlibat dalam pelbagai konflik diri, masalah cinta dan persaingan di antara Julia, Shiela dan Ray, drifter ternama dari Kuala Lumpur. Semua ini pula bakal membawa kepada kematian orang yang disayanginya. Johan cuba mengubah sejarah dengan menggunakan mesin merentas masa untuk kembali ke masa silam. Berjayakah dia? Semuanya bakal terjawab dalam Kampung Drift.

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sepasang suami isteri yang kehilangan anak perempuan mereka. Kerana tekanan faizal membawa Yana ke rumah dusun nya tanpa mengetahui bahawa di rumah tersebut adanya penunggu Rinah dan Hamdi . rinah dan hamdi sepasang suami isteri yang menjadi bomoh dan telah di bunuh di rumah tersebut 20 tahun lalu. Rinah perdayakan Yana kembalikan anaknya naili yang telah mati. Namun yang muncul bukanlah Naili tetapi iblis yang menyerupai Naili.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep2
programme.desc: Arjuna belajar ilmu kesaktian daripada Ezra, ketua Kampung Rembang yang menyediakan pendinding dari ayat-ayat suci Al-Quran untuk melindungi mereka di sepanjang jalan. Semasa sampai di Kampung Teratai, Ezra, Arjuna, Mikael, Suria, dan Sutera merasa pelik dengan penduduk kampung sehinggalah mereka dapat mengesan bahawa penduduk kampung sebenarnya telah dipukau.

programme.title: Nang Nak
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki pulang ke rumah dari berperang di mana isteri dan anaknya menyambutnya dengan penuh semangat. Tetapi ada sesuatu yang tidak menyenangkan tentang isterinya yang cuba disampaikan oleh rakan karibnya dan orang yang baik kepadanya.

programme.title: Iblis
programme.desc: Sejak mereka menduduki rumah tersebut, banyak perkara pelik yang pasangan ini lalui terutamanya Kim. Kim sentiasa diganggu dengan kehadiran figura yang mengganggunya. Den juga rasa sama.

programme.title: Conjuring Spirit
programme.desc: Berikutan pengkhianatan suaminya, seorang novelis berpindah ke bangunan lama, di mana dia menerima kotak muzik dan menemui semangat yang pelik.

programme.title: Coming Soon
programme.desc: Seorang projeksionis muda, Chen, memutuskan untuk merakam filem seram yang baru dikeluarkan secara haram. Selepas tertidur semasa tayangan, dia terjaga dan mendapati rakan konspiratornya telah hilang dan meninggalkan kameranya. Tiba-tiba, filem seram yang mereka tonton di pawagam mula berlaku kepada mereka dalam kehidupan sebenar.

programme.title: Phobia 2
programme.desc: An anthology of five macabre short stories about hungry ghosts, comatose brain dead, a group of bright-eyed actors, an unscrupulous car salesman, and careless backpack tourists.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Gemersik Berbisik E8 - Akhirnya dengan keupayaan yang mereka ada, mereka berhubung dengan hantu buaian(yang sering menyanyikan lagu buaibuaiku laju pada malam hari).

programme.title: The Hitman Bodyguard
programme.desc: Film ini menceritakan tentang seorang pengawal yang harus melindungi pembunuh bayaran, yang sedang dalam perjalanan untuk bersaksi di Pengadilan Kriminal Internasional.

programme.title: Angel Has Fallen
programme.desc: Pahlawan Pendita menemui Arjuna di hadapan leftenan Grakus. dengan itu membenarkan Arjuna memaksimumkan keupayaan sebenar dan melawan kuasa-kuasa jahat?

programme.title: Hatchet 3
programme.desc: Hantu Victor Crowley telah mengganas di Pulau Honey selama beberapa dekad. Marybeth bekerjasama dengan seorang polis dan bekas isterinya untuk menamatkan siri pembunuhan yang dilakukan Crowley untuk selamanya.

programme.title: Arjuna Ep21
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang gadis kampung naif yang datang ke bandar untuk mencari pekerjaan di sebuah pejabat dan di situ dia telah bertemu dengan bekas mat rempit yang telah jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama. Dia berusaha untuk menolong gadis itu sesuaikan diri dengan gaya hidup bandar dan akhirnya gadis kampung itu juga telah jatuh cinta kepadanya. Walaubagaimanapun kerana sifatnya yang matang, ramai wanita mencemburuinya.

programme.title: Pocong The Origin
programme.desc: Pocong the Origin mengisahkan tentang seorang gadis muda bernama Sasthi, lakonan Nadya Arina. Semasa kecil, Sasthi menjalani hari-harinya dengan penuh tekanan dan penghinaan daripada orang sekeliling kerana dia dianggap sebagai keturunan pengikut ilmu hitam.

programme.title: Get Lost
programme.desc: Lima sahabat yang sesat ke Jogjakarta. Selepas kereta itu hilang, mereka terpaksa tinggal di kubu terbiar. Tetapi mereka tidak keseorangan di sana, ada sesuatu yang menunggu di dalam.

programme.title: MAMA
programme.desc: Kisah bermula pada hari lahir ke-15 Alya (Bella Dowanna) yang disambut setiap tahun bersama mamanya, Aini (Nabila Huda). Setelah kematian suami ketika Alya berusia lapan tahun, Aini berusaha keras setiap hari untuk memberikan kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk untuk anaknya.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep 3 Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lekaki yang membela hantu raya yang di warisi oleh ayahnya dengan terpaksa. Namun lama kelamaan dia mula suka dengan saka belaan tersebut. Setelah bertahun-tahun dan usianya yang menghampiri kematian, pak Harun mula sedar dan cuba membuang hantu raya tersebut yang mula menganggu penduduk kampung. Apatah lagi anak gadisnya putus tunang akibat dia membela hantu raya tersebut. Pak Harun akhirnya berjaya membuang hantu raya tersebut dengan bantuan seorang ustaz. Pak harun akhirnya meninggal dunia, anak dan isterinya berpindah selepas kematian pak harun

programme.title: Arjuna Ep3
programme.desc: Yo bergegas ke balai raya lalu memukul beduk untuk mengalihkan perhatian penduduk kampung yang sedang di panggang di atas bara api yang besar. Dengan lantas, Asya diselamatkan dan dia memberitahu bahawa sikap penduduk tiba-tiba berubah kerana sebenarnya kuasa jahat sudah menguasai diri dan fikiran mereka.

programme.title: Azem 4
programme.desc: Ilmu hitam yang canggih telah ditetas oleh seorang syeikh yang jahat dan seorang ibu yang kembali menziarahi anaknya dan isterinya. Tujuan ilmu hitam itu tidak ketara tetapi ia berakhir dengan jenayah yang dilakukan oleh isteri terhadap suaminya.

programme.title: Kampung Drift
programme.desc: Mengisahkan pengembaraan hidup seorang remaja bernama Johan dalam mencari erti kejayaan dan kehidupan menerusi sukan drift yang berkait rapat dengan sejarah hidupnya. Walaupun ditentang keras oleh ayahnya untuk menyertai sukan drift, minat Johan terhadap sukan itu tidak pernah pudar. Bersama-sama kawan baiknya, Bojeng, pakciknya, Ajoi, dan saintis gila, Pak Idon, dia akan menggunakan apa sahaja cara untuk melibatkan diri secara aktif dalam sukan pemotoran drift itu. Minat Johan mula bertukar menjadi sebuah impian besar apabila dia mendapat tahu sejarah hitam ayahnya yang berkait rapat dengan sukan drift. Namun, penglibatan Johan dalam sukan drift ini menghadapi jalan sukar apabila dia terlibat dalam pelbagai konflik diri, masalah cinta dan persaingan di antara Julia, Shiela dan Ray, drifter ternama dari Kuala Lumpur. Semua ini pula bakal membawa kepada kematian orang yang disayanginya. Johan cuba mengubah sejarah dengan menggunakan mesin merentas masa untuk kembali ke masa silam. Berjayakah dia? Semuanya bakal terjawab dalam Kampung Drift.

programme.title: Bohsia Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam
programme.desc: Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam berkisarkan dua gadis, Tasha (Nabila Huda) dan Amy (Salina Saibi). Tanpa pendidikan tinggi dan didikan yang sewajarnya, kedua-duanya terjebak dalam dunia perlumbaan motor haram - satu keputusan mengubah hidup mereka selama-lamanya.

programme.title: Kembang Kantil
programme.desc: Untuk menghadiri persembahan teater Alisa (Bella Ireland) pergi ke rumah abangnya Anton (Fadika Royandi) dan isterinya Santi (Nafa Urbach). Di rumah Alisa bertemu Tania (Richelle Georgette Skonicki), anak angkat Anton dan Siska.

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: Comrade Tanthai(Chatchai Plengpanich) an infamous and highly professional hit man accepts a new assignment from Chaba(Bongkuch Kongmalai),ex-lover of high-ranking mafia honcho, Wong (Thanit Jatanukul). The assignment is to find and kill the drug lord and Godfather of Chinatown, Leemeng(Nirud Sirijanya). Leemeng's death opens up a conflict between the mafia of both the official and unofficial kind. Everyone is now after Tanthai no matter what the cost.

programme.title: Awoken
programme.desc: Apabila tiada apa yang boleh dilakukan untuk pesakit Insomnia Fatal Familial di hospital, seorang pelajar perubatan telah menyuruh abangnya dipindahkan ke kemudahan rahsia di ruang bawah tanah untuk rawatan alternatif.

programme.title: The Hollow One
programme.desc: Bertahun-tahun selepas kematian ibunya, seorang wanita yang mengalami kerosakan emosi mencari bapanya yang hilang dan menghadapi masa lalunya.

programme.title: Gemersik Berbisik Ep 8 Ep8
programme.desc: Gemersik Berbisik E8 - Akhirnya dengan keupayaan yang mereka ada, mereka berhubung dengan hantu buaian(yang sering menyanyikan lagu buaibuaiku laju pada malam hari).

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: Kapal selam kelas Los Angeles AS USS Tampa Bay hilang ketika membayangi kapal selam kelas Akula Rusia Konek di Artik. Laksamana Muda John Fisk (Common) menghantar kapal selam kelas Virginia USS Arkansas, di bawah perintah Komander Joe Glass (Gerard Butler) yang baru dinaikkan pangkat dan tidak ortodoks untuk menyiasat. Pada masa yang sama, pasukan Navy SEAL di bawah pimpinan Leftenan Bill Beaman dihantar untuk memerhatikan pangkalan tentera laut Rusia secara diam-diam. Apabila mereka tiba di pangkalan tentera laut, mereka menyaksikan menteri pertahanan Dmitri Durov melakukan rampasan kuasa dan menawan Presiden Rusia Zakarin, dan dengan cepat menyedari bahawa Durov berhasrat untuk mencetuskan perang.

programme.title: Petaka
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kemiskinan hidup keluarga Sham selepas kematian ayahnya. Ibunya menderita sakit kaki, manakala adiknya, Syikin tidak mampu ke sekolah kerana kekangan kewangan.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan
programme.desc: Ketika keluar berburu di hutan, Tengku Aman Shah telah tertarik hati dengan seorang gadis bernama Manis yang tinggal bersama bapanya pinggir hutan. Tengku Aman Shah merahsiakan identitinya yang sebenar dan menyamar sebagai seorang penyair bernama Sulaiman. Setelah mendedahkan identitinya, Tengku Aman Shah berkahwin dengan Manis secara rahsia. Ketika Tengku Aman Shah pulang ke istana kerana ayahandanya gering, Manis yang sedang hamil diganggu sekumpulan samseng sehingga mengakibatkan kematian bapanya. Manis melarikan diri ke dalam hutan dan bertemu dengan seorang tua yang berwajah hodoh. Orang tua itu memberi perlindungan kepada Manis sehingga dia melahirkan anak.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Mata Shaitan
programme.desc: Ketika keluar berburu di hutan, Tengku Aman Shah telah tertarik hati dengan seorang gadis bernama Manis yang tinggal bersama bapanya pinggir hutan. Tengku Aman Shah merahsiakan identitinya yang sebenar dan menyamar sebagai seorang penyair bernama Sulaiman. Setelah mendedahkan identitinya, Tengku Aman Shah berkahwin dengan Manis secara rahsia. Ketika Tengku Aman Shah pulang ke istana kerana ayahandanya gering, Manis yang sedang hamil diganggu sekumpulan samseng sehingga mengakibatkan kematian bapanya. Manis melarikan diri ke dalam hutan dan bertemu dengan seorang tua yang berwajah hodoh. Orang tua itu memberi perlindungan kepada Manis sehingga dia melahirkan anak.

programme.title: Lanang Sejagat
programme.desc: Sitara ingin mencari pembunuh bapanya yang bernama Datuk Merah. Dalam perjalanan, dia diserang oleh sekumpulan penjahat tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pendekar buta bernama Kasa. Kasa memberitahu Sitara bahawa Datuk Merah telah mati. Sitara terpaksa bermalam di rumah Kasa. Ketika itulah Penghulu mengarahkan orang-orangnya berbuat baik dengan ibu Sitara yang bernama Melati dan menghantar banyak makanan. Sekembalinya Sitara ke rumah, dia berjumpa Penghulu yang meminta pertolongannya untuk membunuh Lanang Sejagat seorang pendekar yang baru muncul di kampung mereka. Suatu hari, pendekar buta Kasa dan anak perempuannya Delima berkunjung ke kampung Sitara. Ketika di rumah Sitara, terbongkarlah rahsia bahawa Kasa sebenarnya adalah Datuk Merah.

programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Puteri Gunung Banang
programme.desc: Wira dan dua orang abangnya, Terab dan Toba adalah tiga orang lelaki tua yang hidup di pinggir sebuah desa dalam keadaan miskin. Pada suatu hari, ketika Wira pergi ke Gunung Banang dia telah ditakdirkan untuk masuk ke alam bunian dan bertemu dengan seorang puteri. Wira terkejut apabila melihat wajahnya kembali muda. Sebelum meninggalkan alam bunian dan kembali ke alam nyata, Puteri Gunung Banang telah menghadiahkan Wira semangkuk air hikmat yang mampu menjadi penawar kepada pelbagai penyakit. Wira berjanji akan menggunakannya untuk membantu orang ramai. Apabila tiba di sebuah perkampungan, Wira berjaya memulihkan seorang gadis yang kurang siuman. Apabila berita kehebatan Wira mengubati pesakit ini tersebar, Terab dan Toba merasa iri hati dan merancang untuk melakukan sesuatu.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Putera Sangkar Maut
programme.desc: Sultan sering menyamar sebagai peminta sedekah untuk melihat sikap rakyat jelatanya dengan lebih dekat. Pada suatu hari, Sultan telah membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan seorang gadis bernama Nilam dan mengahwinkan kakak Nilam yang bernama Dian dengan Mamanda Menteri. Dian enggan berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri kerana dia ingin menjadi isteri Sultan. Namun atas nasihat kekasihnya Panglima Jahang, Dian berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri sebagai satu helah untuk menggulingkan pemerintahan Sultan.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.desc: Andre, kini artis terkenal, adalah kawan lama Tyas. Andre tidak tahu pada mulanya, tetapi selepas berjauhan dengan pengurusnya, dia banyak bersembang dengan Tyas dan meminta maaf. Andre mempunyai banyak cerita tentang kejatuhannya, dan Tyas bersedia membantu Andre dengan apa sahaja sehingga dia berjaya.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep114
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep66
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep18

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep29
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Juragan Tanah Kembali Ke Tanah
programme.desc: Dullah, seorang juragan tanah yang zalim dan kejam. Dia memiliki seorang isteri bernama Maemunah yang taat beragama dan seorang anak perempuan yang cantik bernama Yasmin, seorang pelajar universiti. Dullah menjalankan perniagaan rentenir dan juga broker tanah. Dia meminjamkan wang kepada orang dengan menggunakan sijil tanah dan rumah sebagai cagaran. Jika mereka tidak dapat melunaskan pada masa yang ditetapkan, tanah penghutang akan dirampas.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: With her sister murdered in cold blood, she goes after the killer for revenge, not knowing she's a target herself.

programme.title: Memories Of Murder
programme.desc: Based on a true story, the film follows the path of three detectives as they investigate the grisly rapes and ritualistic killings of local women in small-town of South Korea in 1986.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: The Devil'S Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep395396
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48174818

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3771
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2161
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep196
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yu into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Death Notice
programme.desc: A serial killer leaves death notices in a city, stating when, how and who he will murder. Even if the victims report it to the police and receive protection, the killer can still break through and execute them. While the police sets up a special task force in response, they expose an even bigger conspiracy behind.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Eye 10
programme.desc: This third installment of 'The Eye' horror movie series is about the creepy adventures of a group of teenagers who summon spirits by using the ten methods outlined in a mysterious comic book while vacationing in Thailand.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Black Ransom
programme.desc: Mann, an accomplished police officer, has allowed his career to wane after his wife was murdered by the mafia. However, Mann is forced to return to his former glory when he is assigned to investigate a former police inspector suspected to be kidnapping mafia bosses and demanding ransoms in exchange for their lives.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandits camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leaders wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his Crazy Lo Han Fist improves with every fight.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Rebel Intruders
programme.desc: Thousands of displaced refugees rush to the southern towns to avoid the civil war in north China. Three such young men trained with martial arts skills become sworn brothers, and accidentally got involved in the battle of the rebel leaders in town when they save a refugee girl. Can they fight back against the rebel gangs?

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Shaolin Hand Lock
programme.desc: Li Cheng Yings father was set up and killed by his old friend Ling Hao. Li, who has learnt Shaolin Hand Lock from his father, is on a mission to avenge his death. He works as an undercover guard at Lings house where he meets his long-lost brother, and the two team up to take revenge for their father against Ling.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls high school, is stuck with a baby that isnt his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bills nieces!

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Yi is a skilled disciple of the Hong Quan style kung fu who work in a textile mill recommended by his senior, Han. Han warns Yi not to show off his martial arts skill so as to avoid getting into trouble. However, Yi does not listen and eventually gets dangerously involved in the conflict between two opposing textile mills.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep42
programme.desc: Heads Of The Family - Team Tennyson stops in at a fringe family reunion, and Ben encounters a whole lot more than kooky cousins-- namely, Kevin 11 and the Bugg Brothers, whose latest crackpot invention sparks a series of hilarious head-swaps between all parties.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep43
programme.desc: Bodyguard - When Zombozo hypnotizes Grandpa Max's entire baking class, it is up to Ben and Gwen to clean up the mess, but it gets even messier when Zombozo unveils his new bodyguard: Kevin 11!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Wheels Of Fortune - Team Tennyson's thrift store shopping is ruined by the latest high-speed heist of LaGrange -- who is now aided by a super-fast electromagnetic racing car -- and Ben must convince Kevin 11 to help stop the speed demon's globetrotting robbing spree.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep45
programme.desc: Heat Of The Moment - After Ben easily dispatches the Weatherheads, Team Tennyson travels to a ski resort for some fun in the snow, but when Ben runs into the Weatherheads yet again, this time they are a force to reckon with, now that Kevin 11 has used his Bootleg powers to unlock their emotional controls!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep25
programme.desc: I Put A Hex On You! - When Daphne's makeup vlog lands her as the prime consultant to the famous rock band the Hex Girls, our gang find themselves embroiled in a rockin' mystery.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The High School Wolfman's Musical Lament! - When our mystery solving gang teams up with famous actor Christian Slater they find themselves embroiled in a musical mystery full of songs clues and crazy chases.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Horrible Haunted Hospital Of Dr. Phineas Phrag! - When investigating a haunted old hospital Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Schaal. The gang happily invites her to be a part of their mystery solving group and she's ecstatic. She tags along with our gang helping them solve the mystery of the horrible ghost of Dr. Phineas Phrag. More genetically enhanced monster than man he's been lurking in this hospital since it closed down in the 1950s and he threatens to destroy any trespassers who dare set foot in these creepy old wards. Can our gang and Ms. Schaal discover the truth of this haunted hospital before it's too late? More importantly can Kristen Schaal find out how she best fits into our group? So many fun choices - so little time!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep8
programme.desc: General Jinjur - When Dorothy is captured by General Jinjur to be the 'secret weapon' for her all female army, Dorothy's friends search for her and find an unlikely ally in Wilhelmina.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Where-Helmina's My Broom?! - When Wilhelmina's Broom goes missing, she's on a hunt to find out whoever stole it. But after finding out that Broom ran away, Wilhelmina learns that she needs to be nicer to those around her.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Yellow Brick Road Race - Tired of being bullied, Dorothy and the gang challenge the Wheelers to a race -- the winner of which becomes legal owner of the Yellow Brick Road.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Don't Follow The Yellow Brick Road - While Dorothy and her friends are off exploring the road less traveled, the Nome King magically transports Queen Ozma and her Emerald Castle to his underground kingdom, so he can rule over it.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Tallest Munchkin - Lion's regular rounds as King of the Forest are thrown out of whack when he meets Devin, a boy who says he's a giant Munchkin.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Scarecrow Goes To College - Scarecrow leaves his friends to go to college to up his smarts. With the smartest member gone, the Wicked Witch 'infiltrates' the gang as Fake Scarecrow to steal Dorothy's Ruby Slippers.

programme.desc: I Wish I Could Find My Family - The stakes have never been higher as Ruby wrestles with how to solve a wish that hits close to home. Meanwhile, Daniels in-laws come for a visit, reopening old wounds.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep45

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep25

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep26

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Horrible Haunted Hospital Of Dr. Phineas Phrag! - When investigating a haunted old hospital Scooby Doo and the gang meet up with actor and comedian Kristen Schaal. The gang happily invites her to be a part of their mystery solving group and she's ecstatic. She tags along with our gang helping them solve the mystery of the horrible ghost of Dr. Phineas Phrag. More genetically enhanced monster than man he's been lurking in this hospital since it closed down in the 1950s and he threatens to destroy any trespassers who dare set foot in these creepy old wards. Can our gang and Ms. Schaal discover the truth of this haunted hospital before it's too late? More importantly can Kristen Schaal find out how she best fits into our group? So many fun choices - so little time!

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.desc: The plot revolves around four female fighters who begin as rivals, but subsequently find themselves teaming up against another force.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: The one girl threatening the Evil Queens reign has been training in the art of war with the very Huntsman dispatched to kill her. Evil now fights destiny.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Discover why oats endure a rigorous cooking process before they are turned into tasty granola bars; how one company makes tasty BBQ veggie medleys easy to prepare; the secret to rich blue cheese starts with a tiny drop of cave mould.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Alaska: Last American Frontier - In southeast Alaska, there's an ice-bound Eden that harbors possibly the richest temperate rainforests of all.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the second leg of his four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling from Cyprus, across the sea to Lebanon and on to Israel and the Gaza Strip.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep8
programme.desc: The Rising Tides - The Alaskans push through the deep cold to increase their odds of survival.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Mozambique - In this episode Robson embarks on an African adventure in magical Mozambique, where looks for some awesome angling.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megasharks stereo sniffer.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 5 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Delta Discoveries Ep3
programme.desc: The Western Arctics mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Great Addo Elephant Ep1
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant National Park sits in the heart of the Eastern Cape of South Africa, covering over 1600 square kilometres of land. While the elephants are the stars of the park, Addo is the only reserve in the world where visitors can see all of the big seven: lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo, white rhino, southern right whale, and great white shark.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with natures cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Colors & Patterns Ep7
programme.desc: Get a front-row seat to natures most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - The Big Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megasharks stereo sniffer.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Delta Discoveries Ep3
programme.desc: The Western Arctics mammoth Mackenzie Delta is the second largest in North America after the Mississippi. Here we find strange and mysterious land forms above an immense underbelly of permafrost featuring a phenomenal diversity of microorganisms, and strange creatures that tell a story of an ever changing Arctic. This is the migratory destination - and summer home - to several million birds, fish, animals. .. and humans.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Bush Camps Ep8
programme.desc: Eco-tourism isn't just a background player in the operation of Ol Pejeta, it's the financial backbone that keeps the park operating. From comfortable camping to ultra-luxurious accommodation, the guests that stay at Ol Pejeta live among nature during their stay and they even assist in research and tracking park wildlife.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
