programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 6 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Girls of Oryx Plain Ep9
programme.desc: A baby rhino's mother is illegally shot and Ol Pejeta staff have to calm the wild baby. It's not ideal to separate the calf from her mother, but the situation is dire, and the calf will have to be hand-raised. Also, a look at a four-year-old captive rhino that went through the same thing and is now entering a new stage in life.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Fall on the Tundra Ep4
programme.desc: Nunavik, meaning Great Land, is bigger than California. It is a pristine wilderness of water, forest and tundra, and home to the Inuit of Northern Quebec.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Table Mountain Ep2
programme.desc: Table Mountain National Park on the southwestern tip of Africa is a park surrounded by ocean and humanity. It is a rugged peninsula jutting out into the cold Atlantic Ocean and forming an island of incredible diversity.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Wanderers of the Lost Forest Ep3
programme.desc: This story takes place in the town of Hogsback, a tiny village on the top of a mountain in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. Due to habitat loss and fragmentation, the Samango monkeys and Cape Parrots of the nearby forests have been forced to search for food outside of their natural habitats and venture into the town on a daily basis.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Ocean Legacy Ep4
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 7 Ep7

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Critical Plains Ep10
programme.desc: While the Ol Pejeta staff help move a herd of hartebeest to another park, an ailing eland is spotted. Suffering from a wound from an illegal trap, the massive antelope will have to be tranquilized and treated before it's too late. After the eland is dealt with, a baby hartebeest will need to be herded back with her main group of antelope.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Wild Seas Ep5
programme.desc: On the north-east coast of Baffin Island, in Canadas Arctic, lies Ninginganiq, a blustery wilderness where only the intrepid travel. In fall, it is so dangerous that even seasoned Inuit sailors keep away.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - iSimangoliso Ep3
programme.desc: In the northeastern corner of South Africa lays a land of unparalleled beauty that encompasses pristine beaches and vibrant coral reefs, lush wetlands and lakes, and vast forests and open plains. Each landscape provides sanctuary for a range of animals. Known locally as the Miracle, due to its beauty, this is the magical world of iSimangaliso.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.desc: MGM Cotai, Macau - Monica and Giles travel to the self-governing Chinese city of Macau to explore behind the scenes of one of its newest and most high-tech hotels.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Rick drops in on the fishing port of Boscastle and finds a fabulous seafood restaurant in a building that once housed rockets used to fire safety ropes out to sinking ships. A trip to Cornwall's only dedicated organic mushroom farm inspires him to cook a stir-fry with lion's mane mushrooms, which are said to regrow neurons!

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Cake Week - Bakers explore the world of cakes, including a fresh fruit loaf and an ambitious Macadamia and Lemon Meringue Roulade. Bakers then reveal the stories that made them who they are in a Showstopping Core memory cake scape.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep52
programme.desc: Noddy And The Case Of The Raining Carrots - Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air. Clever Noddy realises that Deltoid and Smartysaurus are matched in weight and are, therefore, the ideal partners to play on the see-saw. The friendly dinosaur is delighted and the Farm Fair can go ahead without any more raining vegetables- thanks to Noddy! Case closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep52
programme.desc: Why Cheetah Has Tears - You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep52
programme.desc: Winter Breeze - Breeze is visiting the track. The beach is boring in the winter as nobody comes to visit. She tries her best to help everyone get ready for the winter festival but doesn't seem to be good at anything

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep26
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Very Important Person - PC Selby is being honoured with a medal for being Best local Policeman of the year and Pat is despatched to Pencaster bay to collect both the medal and the person who is going to present it; The Duchess of Pencaster! Somewhat star struck Pat and Jess drive the Duchess towards Pencaster back to the award ceremony at Greendale but at her request they stop to help some of the villagers which unfortunately leads to her getting covered in coal dust and mud! PC Selby is also on his way to Greendale and also finds people in need of help and his best uniform is soon torn and covered in paint and compost! The Duchess and PC Selby meet and wonder quite how they are going to explain their tattered appearance to the crowd at the award ceremony. Luckily Pat explains how both PC Selby and The Duchess put helping others before themselves. Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep20
programme.desc: Desert Scraptors - When the Desert Scraptors mistakenly think Click-Clack is their leader, D-Structs' plan to have them attack Ty and the crew is derailed.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep20
programme.desc: Zoo-Lander / Balloonatics - Shadow and Skidmark embark on a perilous adventure through the zoo to rescue Deuce.//Whiplash attempts to keep the crew from meeting his parents.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep20
programme.desc: Scared Crazy / Superslushious - Tip and Oh go camping but soon learn about a crazy Boov who scares everyone; Oh upgrades Slushious to Superslushious things get out of hand.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep25
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 1 - When El Circo Dos Grillos comes to town, Lucky and Spirit learn circus tricks.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep26
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 2 - With El Circo Dos Grillos in town, memories of Milagro prompt big changes for Lucky and Jim.

programme.desc: Wrestlebabia: The Musica / Flowers For Munk - When Sandy can't join animal wrestling she poses as Mandy Monkhuahua; In order to help Munk, Grug sticks super worms up his nose that make him smarter

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep43
programme.desc: They Might Be Sky Giants / The Grugest Story Ever Told - After getting hit on the head, Eep has a vision and sets out to get the Valley to show how thankful they are; Grug feels like he's the biggest joke in Ahhh Valley, so he asks Thunk to make a buy-o-pic of him to show people just how truly great he is

programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.desc: Doc Doc Who's There?/Tour Guide of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But it seems as though Finn isnt interested

programme.desc: The Terror Of Tickula / Prank'd - Turbo and Whiplash meet a strange tick who may be out to harm Turbo.//When the crew starts a prank war, Chet is nervous that he is the next target.

programme.desc: Over Shadowed / Beware The Chickipede - White Shadow quits racing and it's up to Turbo to convince him to get back on the track.//The crew becomes detectives and meets a strange new creature.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep53

programme.desc: Australian Blunder Down Under - When a mother kangaroo hops away with Wally's hat on her head and Fritz in her pouch, Wally, Wenda and Odlulu must work together. They use the Talk to Animals Keys to track the runaway kangaroo through the Australian Outback.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to Pawston \ Ruff Day on the Job - Tag wants to bring her new neighbor, Scooch, to the Party in the Tree. But a series of traffic jams make Tag impatient, and she keeps trying to find different ways to get to the party. Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep1
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Cornish Caper - Ted Glenn's Cornish cousin Ned is sending him a steam engine as an alternative means to power his workshop. Pat and Jess set off to Cornwall to collect this very large special delivery in the SDS Plane whilst Ted sets about giving away all of his old inventions to the people of Greendale in order to clear out enough space for the engine. Pat and Jess meet the eccentric Ned Glenn at his workshop and wrestle with the crate containing the heavy engine to get it aboard the plane. Back in Greendale the villagers are only too delighted to take all of Ted's weird and wonderful inventions off his hands but the more inventions that go, the more gloomy Ted gets. After a trip over a very bumpy field and flight in the plane, Pat finally delivers the engine to a now very sad Ted. He's depressed because he loves to tinkering with things, and now he has nothing left to tinker with. Maybe the engine will cheer him up but when Pat takes the side off the crate, just a heap of engine parts spill out. The engine was shaken apart on the journey. Pat is very sorry but Ted is delighted. Now he has something to tinker with again! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep21
programme.desc: Inside Jokings / It's A Jungle In There - Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Oh's new alien plant while he's gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep27
programme.desc: Lucky and La Voltereta Feroz - While Lucky and Spirit struggle to find their place In the circus, Pru and Abigail set out across the frontier to track down their runaway friend

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep28
programme.desc: Lucky and the No-Good Outlaw Butch Lepray - Lucky gets into trouble when the circus picks up a stranded woman who isn't what she seems

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep45
programme.desc: Tunnel Of Terror / Creature From The Croods Lagoon - Eep, Thunk, Lerk, and Womp set out to make it to the end of The Tunnel of Terror within the Cave of Secrets; After being rescued by a mysterious creature at the watering hole, Thunk tries to convince the Valley that a sea thing exists and it's not just his imagination

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep49

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep35
programme.desc: Postman - When Mum and Dad have a disagreement, Bluey makes Dad write a love letter to Mum to make up. Bluey must find a way to play Ground's Lava with Bingo and deliver the letter to Mum, without squabbling.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Detective Badge - A freshly baked apple pie is swiped from Duggee's windowsill, so he dons his detective badge to track down the thief.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Submarine Badge - The dog and the squirrels go off on an underwater adventure with Betty's dad in his submarine, spotting creatures including a giant sea stallion and some jazz fish.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Bubble Badge - The dog blows a lot of bubbles with his pot of bubble mixture. Though it is quite hard to do, most of the squirrels eventually get the hang of it and the clubhouse fills up with lots of bubbles.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Cafe - In the park, Bluey meets a new playmate named Winnie, but when Bluey wants to invite her and her dad home for breakfast, she learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Swim School - Mum, Dad, and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass swim school, but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving to be very difficult.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Andy and the Sarcastic Fringehead - Andy heads to the Pacific coast of California in search of a sarcastic fringehead.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Emergency Machines - Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all used in emergencies! Grace rides a police motorbike, shows off a rescue submarine and drives a mountain rescue 4X4 vehicle.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S6 Ep11
programme.desc: Line's Pirate Choir - Line decides to start his very own pirate choir with the help of Cook and Captain HeyHo.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Rainbow - After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S16 Ep13
programme.desc: Sodor Surprise Day - It is Sodor Surprise Day, which involves everyone trying to surprise each other. At Tidmouth Sheds, Thomas and Charlie are surprising each other. Gordon thinks they are being very silly indeed.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Woolly Memories - Scarf Lady's old film reels get themselves in a tangle, so Sarah and Duck decide to recreate the footage.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep45
programme.desc: The Shadow Castle - Nelly and Nora build a sandcastle good enough for the sun.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dog Loves Snark - Dog and Pug meet a pirate captain on a desert island who is hunting the Snark. Our friends realise that they should protect the Snark and develop a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep9
programme.desc: It's Time to Play Hospitals - When Panda's arm gets a small tear in the park, Gran Gran has a plan to head home and set up a hospital for Panda and JoJo's other toys!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Piled-Up Play - When Jo's game of Target Ball overruns and the Blockers shut down the playing field, Team Tinpo come up with a sweet solution so three games can be played at the same time.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Kick Around - Team Tinpo are playing a game in their back yard when Doug-Po kicks the ball over a fence. How can they get their ball back?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Zoo - Bluey's backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tree Badge - Duggee helps the Squirrels learn about all the amazing things trees do for the creatures who live amongst them, and earn their tree badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Day Out Badge - Duggee takes the Squirrels and their parents on an exciting mystery trip to a surprising destination, where they learn they can make anywhere special and earn their Big Day Out badges in the process!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Pen Pal Badge - Duggee arranges for the Squirrels to write to some pen pals, helping them to learn all about life in far away places, earning their Pen Pal badges and making some new friends in the process!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Climate Change, The Arctic Ocean - The Go Jetters are watching for polar bears, but an iceberg is heading for their ship!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Holi Festival of Colour, India - Glitch takes all of the colourful powder from the Festival of Colour in Dwarka, India. Can the Go Jetters get it back?

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Treasure In The Plant Aisle - In the perilous plant aisle Supertato and Evil Pea team up to find treasure as they have half a map each, but she tricks him and steals the map to find the treasure for herself.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Operation Jewel - Evil Pea steals Tomato's precious jewel. Supertato ventures to get it back by secretly lifting the jewel from Evil Pea's crown and defeating a crowd of rampaging Mini Peas.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep77
programme.desc: Sleepybyes - The Teletubbies say goodnight to the Tiddlytubbies; it is sleepybyes time. But Po isn't tired anymore and goes for a special ride on her scooter.

programme.desc: Squirrel Jelly / The String - SpongeBob and Patrick have their peaceful day of jelly fishing disturbed by Sandy's competitive nature. // SpongeBob pulls from Squidward's shirt a loose string that never seems to end.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Whale Watching - Mr. Krabs hires Squidward to babysit Pearl for the night, but she just wants to sneak out to a cool teen party!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Unboxing Day / Dave's Pavilion - Alvin's attempts to make money as an internet influencer almost drives a local toy store out of business. // When the Chipmunks accidently ruin Dave's new pavilion, they allow Miss Miller to take the fall.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep503
programme.desc: U-Fly / Yeti or Not - Alvin's too short to ride an exhilarating new amusement park ride, so he devises a plan to sneak on afterhours. // On a ski trip, Alvin convinces Theodore there's a Yeti nearby, making life miserable for the rest of the family.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep273
programme.desc: Potato Puff / There Will Be Grease! - Mrs. Puff's new substitute teacher gives SpongeBob a crash course in driving. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton must work together after discovering a well of miracle-grease under their restaurants.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep274
programme.desc: Big Bad Bubble Bass / Sea-Man Sponge Haters Club - Karen tells the fairytale of a nerd trying to steal an action figure from his three little neighbors. // Squidward hosts a secret "We Hate SpongeBob Club" at his house.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep263
programme.desc: The Kwarantined Krab - Mr. Krabs makes Spongebob and Squidward cook a fancy meal for Mrs. Puff, but every dish becomes a dispute.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Treasure of Kamp Koral / Camper Gary - SpongeBob and Patrick find buried treasure at camp, but Mr. Krabs becomes desperate to get his claws on it. // SpongeBob disguises Gary as a new camper to keep him safe from Mrs. Puff.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep524
programme.desc: Fright Bite / The Loudly Bones - When a vampire moves into Royal Woods, Lucy must convince him to turn the Mortician's Club into vampires. // Lisa discovers that the dinosaur bones she found in her backyard may not be what they seem.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Present Danger / Stressed for the Part - Dressed as David Steele, Lincoln is on the hunt for his stolen birthday present before it's destroyed. // After landing a role in a Dairyland production, Luan must hide this news from Mrs. Bernardo, who she beat out.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Scales of Justice / Crimes of Fashion - When Lana learns her favorite fish are in jeopardy of losing their home to construction she springs into action. // When Leni gets fired from her job due to missing scarves, Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep286
programme.desc: Hot Crossed Nuts / Sir Urchin and Snail Fail - Sandy's homemade snack becomes a big hit at the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick's favorite comedy duo has a falling out on live television.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep275
programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Home Ecch! / Fun & Done! - Squidina hosts a television show to pass a home economics class. // Patrick and SpongeBob try to unlock a dull child's imagination.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Movers and Fakers - Tired of not having a space of his own, Bobby secretly moves into a vacant apartment unit in the building. Feat. Lori Loud

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Home Improvement / Undivided Attention - Laird is nervous to host movie night at his house, so Ronnie Anne helps him pretend Arturo's pad is his own! // Carlota can't seem to pay attention to anything but her phone, so Carlos sets her up - with a math tutor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Chancla Force / Fluff Love - Carl takes Rosa's chancla, setting off the balance of order in the city, & calling the Chancla Force into action! // Carlitos goes on a wild adventure to get his favorite stuffed animal from the arcade.

programme.desc: Food PBBFT! Truck / Upturn Girls - SpongeBob and Squidward try to sell krabby patties from a food truck in the darkest depths of the ocean. // Pearl and Narlene have a whales' day out in the big city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13 Ep276
programme.desc: Say 'Awww!'/ Patrick the Mailman - Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep166
programme.desc: The Way of the Sponge - SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns. Will Sandy be able to help?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 1 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Part 2 - Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

programme.title: Inovasi 2.0 @Bernama TV #1 (Rpt)

programme.title: Q+A Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 17 - Is the economy working for all Australians? Inflation may have peaked but many still feel under the pump. The panel discuss interest rates, economic growth, the risk of recession, war in Europe and impact on supply chains.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep32
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep52
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Coombs Curtain Wall Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - IT consultant Damien Lederer and lawyer wife Cristy take the concept of a house in the suburbs up a notch when they set out to build a super contemporary environmental home on Canberra's outskirts.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Paul Haar - Architect & Educator Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Paul Haar is a visionary architect whose approach to buildings is guided by a relationship with the landscape and knowing where the timber we use to build originates.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep72
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep38
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep52
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep26
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEDT, Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Four Corners - Super Power Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The cost of living with Coles and Woolworths. We uncover the tactics used by supermarkets to keep prices high - and competition out. Both deny price gouging but there are now six inquiries and reviews targeting the duopoly.

programme.title: Old People's Home For Teenagers Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - The participants put on a big show at the retirement village, they're retested by the experts to find out if their wellbeing has improved, and we see how their friendships are flourishing months later. (Season Final)

programme.title: Media Watch Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment, bringing you a brave and fearless critique of the week's journalism, issues and events in the news. Presented by Paul Barry.

programme.title: ABC Late News Ep52
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep38

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Submission Specialists - UFC Unleashed features the best fights from the UFC archives, all in one show. Unleashed brings you the big fights that you missed or want to see all over again.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep910AdesanyavsPereira
programme.desc: At UFC 281, dominant middleweight champion Israel Adesanya puts his title on the line against longtime rival, Alex Pereira. See both men train and prepare ahead of their matchup in New Yorks Madison Square Garden.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep505JoseAldoKingsMMAAndersonSilva
programme.desc: Jose Aldo gives us insight into his unique relationship with coach and lifelong friend Dede Pederneiras. Master Rafael Cordeiro gives a detailed history of world-renowned gym Kings MMA. UFC fighters explain why ten-time middleweight title defender Anderson Silva, was so iconic to the world of MMA.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC285JonesvsGane
programme.desc: At UFC 285, former 205-pound champ Jon Jones moves up to face Ciryl Gane for the heavyweight belt in the main event. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will face Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep9
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep9
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Prelims - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. But on March 9 at Kaseya Center in Miami, Florida, Suga Sean will face a tough challenge in his first title defense when he meets the only man to beat him, top contender Marlon Chito Vera, in the main event of UFC 299. Ecuadors Vera earned his shot at a world championship with wins over the likes of Frankie Edgar, Rob Font, Dominick Cruz and Pedro Munhoz, but in the three years since they first fought, OMalley has taken his game to new levels, and he is eager to even the score in a high stakes title fight that will have the world watching.

programme.title: UFC 299: O'Malley vs. Vera 2
programme.desc: Main Event - Newly crowned UFC bantamweight champion Sean OMalley has been the talk of the sports world since he took the belt from Aljamain Sterling. programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback
programme.desc: Episode 901: UFC 256 Figueiredo vs Moreno 1 - An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rozenstruik vs. Gaziev
programme.desc: Prelims - The heavyweights take center stage at the APEX on Sunday, March 3, when unbeaten rising star Shamil Gaziev looks to smash his way into the Top 15 when he faces noted knockout artist Jairzinho Rozenstruik in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in 12 pro fights, Bahrains Gaziev kept the momentum going from his win on Dana Whites Contender Series with a knockout of Martin Buday, and now hell tackle the equally imposing Rozenstruik, who has scored knockouts in all seven of his UFC wins, stopping Junior Dos Santos, Alistair Overeem and Andrei Arlovski in the process
